Hi there, 

I've check all the available documentation on whether there is a 
possibility to print my own debug output messages from a test case in 
a controlled way - ideally I would like to get them in a 
"results.txt" like can be produced by the junit task in ant. It seems 
that this is not the way that I'm supposed to go, since there seems to 
be no option for that. 

Nevertheless, it would be nice to use the test case for debugging 
(until it works).
It there an option for that? 

Cheers, 

Chris
subject: printing my own debug messages
